texts.value: Receptor for adenosine. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which inhibits adenylyl cyclase (PubMed:8234299)
Expressed in the lung and bone. Expressed at lower levels in osteosarcoma tissues (at protein level)
Belongs to the G-protein coupled receptor 1 family

features.description: in a colorectal cancer sample; somatic mutation; dbSNP:rs746154553
